document.masterDocTitle: A checklist of bat-associated macronyssid mites (Acari: Gamasina: Macronyssidae) of Russia, with new host and geographical records

subSubSection.paragraph:
Material. F ex
Hypsugo savii Bonaparte, 1837
from Shura-Ozen’ river, 17 May 2019 , leg. D.G. Smirnov; 2 FF, 6 N1 ex
Pipistrellus nathusii
from village Elimbetovo, 20 August 2014 , leg. A. V . Zhigalin; 8 N1 ex
Myotis daubentonii
from village Elimbetovo, 25 August 2014 , leg. A. V . Zhigalin; M, 4 N1 ex
P . nathusii
from Mordovian State Natural Reserve, 21 June 2016 , leg. D.G. Smirnov; N1 ex
M . daubentonii
from Mordovian State Natural Reserve, 22 June 2016 , leg. D.G. Smirnov; F, 2 MM , 5 N1 ex
M . dasycneme
from Mordovian State Natural Reserve, 23 June 2016 , leg. D.G. Smirnov; N1 ex
Vespertilio murinus
from State Nature Reserve “Samarskaya Luka”, 1-31 July 2006 , leg. D.G. Smirnov; 10 FF, 8 N1 ex
P . nathusii
from village Sosnovka, 1-31 May 2006 , leg. D.G. Smirnov; F ex
V . murinus
from Pervouralsk, 20 July 2015 , leg. O.L. Orlov; F ex
Eptesicus nilssonii
from Serpievskaya cave, 27 July 2011 , leg. O.L. Orlov; M ex
M . dasycneme
from Serpievskaya cave, 1 November 2012 , leg. O.L. Orlov; F, M, 7 N1 ex
P . nathusii
from Natural Park “Nurgush”, 19 June 2006 , leg. D.G. Smirnov; 3 N1 ex
P . nathusii
from Pogromnoye settlement, 26 June 2003 , leg. D.G. Smirnov.

Distribution outside Russian Federation :
Europe ( Radovsky, 1967 ; Micherdzinski, 1980 ), Asia ( Stanyukovich, 1997 ), Africa (Algeria, Egypt, Libya) (Benda et al ., 2014).

Hosts.
Pipistrellus nathusii
(
Medvedev et al ., 2000
;
Zabashta et al ., 2019
; present paper),
Pi . pipistrellus
(
Zabashta et al ., 2019
; Orlova & Orlov, 2018),
Pi . kuhlii
(
Zabashta et al ., 2019
;
Orlova et al ., 2020b
),
Pi . pygmaeus (
Zabashta et al ., 2019
)
,
Pi . coromandra Gray, 1838
( Stanyukovich, 1997 ),
Myotis blythii ( Stanyukovich, 1997 )
,
M . myotis ( Stanyukovich, 1997 )
,
M . dasycneme
( Stanyukovich, 1997 ; present paper),
M . daubentonii
( Stanyukovich, 1997 ; present paper),
M . mystacinus ( Stanyukovich, 1997 )
,
M . brandtii ( Stanyukovich, 1997 )
,
M . cappaccinii ( Stanyukovich, 1997 )
,
M . emarginatus ( Stanyukovich, 1997 )
,
M . nattereri ( Stanyukovich, 1997 )
,
Plecotus auritus ( Stanyukovich, 1997 )
,
P . austriacus ( Stanyukovich, 1997 )
,
Vespertilio murinus
( Stanyukovich, 1997 ; present paper),
Eptesicus nilssonii
( Stanyukovich, 1997 ; present paper),
E . serotinus ( Stanyukovich, 1997 )
,
Barbastella barbastellus ( Stanyukovich, 1997 )
,
Nyctalus noctula ( Stanyukovich, 1997 )
,
Hypsugo savii
(present paper),

,
